files.description: Documents artifact rules, naming conventions, schema/versioning, and overwrite/retention policy for files under outputs/.
Defines the outputs manifest with schema versions and a machine-readable list of generated artifacts and their metadata.
Runs an end-to-end demo that generates outputs/results.json and outputs/figure.png and then updates outputs/manifest.json accordingly.
Stores the most recent end-to-end run results in JSON format as referenced by the outputs manifest.
Stores a generated figure image from the end-to-end run as referenced by the outputs manifest.

missionDescription: Implement goal_outputs_bootstrap_20251224_01 by creating ./outputs/README.md (artifact rules + naming + overwrite policy), ./outputs/manifest.json (list of artifacts + schema versions), and at least one end-to-end run that populates results.json/figure.png and updates the manifest.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Defines a concrete bootstrap deliverable set that directly fixes the audit failure (0 artifacts) and operationalizes the /outputs contract as the system interface....
